trans-unit.source: Represents the removal of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> from a workflow during dynamic update.
This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been removed during a dynamic update.

An instance of this object is generated for every <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> that is removed (that is, that existed in the workflow prior to this dynamic update, but is gone afterward).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction"></xref> class by using the definition of the removed condition.
The condition removed from the workflow.
addedConditionDefinition is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction.ConditionDefinition"></xref> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets a string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
